title: Me
text:
Hello, I’m Wei Xuan, From AAI. I love travelling and discovering new places.



Plane

title: FYP Project
text:
This FPY Project was done during Polytechnic.


Many estate bins are emptied on a fixed timetable. Some are still half-empty when the truck arrives, while others overflow before the next round. This wastes fuel and labour.
###Solution
I designed and built a Smart Dustbin that measures how full it is and sends the data to a cloud dashboard. When the bin reaches 80 % capacity, the system alerts cleaners to pick it up.This project was dine using arduino and ESP32. The data is sent to a cloud dashboard using ThingSpeak. The system is powered by a solar panel, so it can be used in remote areas without electricity.



SmartDustbin

title: Travel
text:
Walking through the narrow lanes of Gion, I watched locals move quietly and politely, even when the streets felt crowded.
The calm pace forced me to slow down too. I learnt to:

Plan less, notice more – leaving gaps in my itinerary meant I could linger in a teahouse and sketch the wooden façades.

Practise everyday respect – a gentle bow and soft “arigatō” changed interactions with shopkeepers.

Influence: Since returning, I schedule short “tea breaks” in my day to pause, breathe, and reset my focus.



Japan

title: Reflection
section: What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
text:
What is the GenAI tool you have used? Why did you choose it?
I use Chatgpt cause it is a very powerful tool that can help me with my work. I can use it to generate ideas, write code, and even create content for my website. I chose it because it is easy to use and has a lot of features that can help me with my work.

title: Reflection
section: How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment
text:
How did the GenAI tool help you in completing the assessment
The GenAI tool assist me in understand the requirement of the assessment.

title: Reflection
section: How do you think will GenAI tools assist you for your future study or work?
text:
How do you think will GenAI tools assist you for your future study or work?
I think GenAI tools will assist me in my future study or work by helping me to generate ideas. I can use it to automate some of the tasks that I do on a daily basis, which will free up my time to focus on more important things.
